title: BOHLERT MASSEY INTERIORS logo
content:
Hi friend

Please Hlep me id the font used for BOHLERT MASSEY INTERIORS logo

Thanks in advance

Hernando

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002050242im_/http:/typophile.com/files/innerheaderlogo_4394.gif)

 [‹ This Bookman made my hair fall out...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002050242/http:/typophile.com/node/50044 "Go to previous forum topic") [Patriotic/Victorian ID please ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002050242/http:/typophile.com/node/50040 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content: The M in the logo is Shogun by Margo Chase from Font Bureau. But the other stuff is too small for me to tell.
